entry.def: Soccer is a game played by two teams of eleven players using a round ball. Players kick the ball to each other and try to score goals by kicking the ball into a large net. Outside the USA, this game is also referred to as football .

means.word_mean: 1. a football game in which two teams of 11 players try to kick or head a ball into the opponents' goal
